    public class GameCanvasPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The class of the map in the center of the GUI window.

    fhenrir

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameCanvasPanel

        public GameCanvasPanel(GUI parent)
        Constructor of the GameCanvasPanel: Initializes the GameImages class, which contains the game images. Calculates the cell corners and centers, and creates a new GraphicCell matrix.
        Parameters:
